title: First State National Historical Park: Public Day May 21
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Calendar     2016 Centennial Bioblitz     Public Day May 21                Public Participation Day, May 21        Come have fun with us!    Help us look for bugs, identify plants, and learn about the national park in your backyard! Bring your lunch and enjoy the picnic area at the BioBlitz festival.   Weather can be unpredictable at this time of year. Participants should be prepared and dress appropriately. All should wear closed-toe-shoes, bring water and use sun protection.     If you have any questions or concerns, please email us at e-mail us.    See you at the BioBlitz!       Maps and Brochures>>
